generated_content.title: Ufo Mysteries in Phoenix, Arizona - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Witness the breathtaking spectacle of The Phoenix Lights, a rare and awe-inspiring UFO sighting that took place on March 13, 1997. Explore the city's UFO-themed attractions, including the International UFO Museum and Research Center.
